Crit Effect

Type
Second Thoughts You are sickened 3.

Melee
Mix it Up You can't make ranged attacks until the end of your next turn.

Ranged
Hangnail If you attacked with a claw or fist, you can't use that attack until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed
Magic Vacuum The effects of all beneficial spells affecting you end immediately.

name: Critical Fumble Deck #12
